newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - IONA Technologies start.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - IONA Technologies start.

text.p: -- Robertson Stephens & Co said it started coverage of IONA Technologies Plc with a buy rating based on its position as a "significant player in the early stage, rapidly growing market for software tools."
-- IONA provides software connectivity and integration tools for professional developers and corporate programmers.
-- In a statement, Robertson Stephens said IONA grew revenues by 145 percent in 1996. The investment firm expects revenues to grow by 89 percent in 1997 and 69 percent in 1998.
-- Robertson Stephens has a price targe of $30, which is 44 times its 1998 earnings forecast of $0.68/shr.
